cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ue

sentence.kanji: 上を向いて。
sentence.romaji: ue wo muite
sentence.english: Look up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's asa

sentence.kanji: 気持ちのいい朝です。
sentence.romaji: kimochi no ii asa desu
sentence.english: It's a pleasant morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sen

sentence.kanji: 千円貸してください。
sentence.romaji: senen kashite kudasai
sentence.english: Please lend me 1000 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ageru

sentence.kanji: 彼は荷物をあみだなに上げた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nimotsu wo amidana ni ageta
sentence.english: He put the luggage on the luggage rack.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiroi

sentence.kanji: 彼は歯が白い。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ha ga shiroi
sentence.english: His teeth are white.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shita

sentence.kanji: 財布は机の下にあった。
sentence.romaji: saifu ha tsukue no shita ni ata
sentence.english: My purse was under the desk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noboru

sentence.kanji: 猫が屋根に上っている。
sentence.romaji: neko ga yane ni nobote iru
sentence.english: The cat's up on the roof.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyaku

sentence.kanji: 私の祖母は百才です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no sobo ha hyakusai desu
sentence.english: My grandmother is 100 years old.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nobori

sentence.kanji: これは上り電車です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha nobori densha desu
sentence.english: This is the train going downtown.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's agaru

sentence.kanji: 私たちは２階に上がった。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha nikai ni agata
sentence.english: We went up to the second floor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oriru

sentence.kanji: そこの階段を下りてください。
sentence.romaji: soko no kaidan wo orite kudasai
sentence.english: Please go down those stairs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sagaru

sentence.kanji: やっと熱が下がった。
sentence.romaji: yato netsu ga sagata
sentence.english: His fever finally went down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kudari

sentence.kanji: もうすぐ下りの電車が発車します。
sentence.romaji: mousugu kudari no densha ga hasha shimasu
sentence.english: The train out of the city leaves soon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sageru

sentence.kanji: 少し音量を下げてください。
sentence.romaji: sukoshi onryou wo sagete kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn the volume down a little.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiro

sentence.kanji: 白は雪の色です。
sentence.romaji: shiro ha yuki no iro desu
sentence.english: White is the color of snow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's agaru

sentence.kanji: 彼は人前だと上がってしまう。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hitomae da to agate shimau
sentence.english: He gets nervous in front of other people.

cards.english: go down, go down or away from a central place
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kudaru

sentence.kanji: 小さな船が川を下っています。
sentence.romaji: chiisa na fune ga kawa wo kudate imasu
sentence.english: A small ship is going down the river.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joushou

sentence.kanji: 地球の気温は上昇している。
sentence.romaji: chikyuu no kion ha joushou shite iru
sentence.english: The temperature of the earth is rising.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimeru

sentence.kanji: 私に届くメールのうち、迷惑メールが7割を占めている。
sentence.romaji: watashi ni todoku me-ru no uchi meiwaku me-ru ga nanawari wo shimete iru
sentence.english: About 70 percent of emails sent to me are junk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's marui

sentence.kanji: 地球は丸い。
sentence.romaji: chikyuu ha marui。
sentence.english: The earth is round.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maru

sentence.kanji: 紙に大きな丸を書きました。
sentence.romaji: kami ni ooki na maru wo kakimashita
sentence.english: I drew a big circle on the paper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shita

sentence.kanji: 舌を出してください。
sentence.romaji: shita wo dashite kudasai
sentence.english: Stick out your tongue.

cards.english: bring down, take down, pull down
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's orosu

sentence.kanji: 棚からその箱を下ろしてください。
sentence.romaji: tana kara sono hako wo oroshite kudasai
sentence.english: Please take the box down from the shelf.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naka

sentence.kanji: 財布は引き出しの中にあります。
sentence.romaji: saifu ha hikidashi no naka ni arimasu
sentence.english: My purse is in the drawer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yononaka

sentence.kanji: 世の中にはいろいろな人がいます。
sentence.romaji: yononaka ni ha iroiro na hito ga imasu
sentence.english: There are many different people in the world.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jouhin

sentence.kanji: このドレスはとても上品なデザインですね。
sentence.romaji: kono doresu ha totemo jouhin na dezain desu ne
sentence.english: This dress has a very elegant design.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuuko

sentence.kanji: その車は中古で買ったんだ。
sentence.romaji: sono kuruma ha chuuko de kata n da
sentence.english: I bought that car second hand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kami

sentence.kanji: お上は何を考えてるんだろうね。
sentence.romaji: okami ha nani wo kangaete ru n darou ne
sentence.english: What is the government planning on?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's agaru

sentence.kanji: 今日は仕事が早く上がったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha shigoto ga hayaku agata n da
sentence.english: I finished work early today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kudasaru

sentence.kanji: 先生が手紙を下さいました。
sentence.romaji: sensei ga tegami wo kudasaimashita
sentence.english: The teacher gave me a letter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jouge

sentence.kanji: この服は上下セットで買いました。
sentence.romaji: kono fuku ha jouge seto de kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought these clothes as a top and bottoms set.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moka

sentence.kanji: 息子は目下勉強中です。
sentence.romaji: musuko ha moka benkyouchuu desu
sentence.english: My son is in the middle of studying.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ueshita

sentence.kanji: 彼は上下おそろいの服を着ていますね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ueshita osoroi no fuku wo kiteimasu ne 。
sentence.english: He is wearing a matching top and bottom.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuusei

sentence.kanji: 彼女は中世の音楽が好きです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha chuusei no ongaku ga suki desu
sentence.english: She likes medieval music.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meue

sentence.kanji: 彼は目上の人にとても気を使います。
sentence.romaji: kare ha meue no hito ni totemo ki wo tsukaimasu
sentence.english: He's very respectful of his seniors.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souchou

sentence.kanji: 私は早朝のジョギングを日課にしています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha souchou no jogingu wo nika ni shite imasu
sentence.english: It's my routine to go jogging every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's myouchou

sentence.kanji: 明朝10時からまた会議です。
sentence.romaji: myouchou 10 ji kara mata kaigi desu
sentence.english: There's another meeting from ten o'clock tomorrow morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's burasageru

sentence.kanji: 彼は首にカメラをぶら下げているね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kubi ni kamera wo burasagete iru ne
sentence.english: He has a camera around his neck.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ge

sentence.kanji: 彼女の成績は上の下です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no seiseki ha jou no ge desu
sentence.english: Her grades are ranked at the bottom of the top group.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mizukara

sentence.kanji: 社長自らがその会社と交渉したよ。
sentence.romaji: shachou mizukara ga sono kaisha to koushou shita yo
sentence.english: The president himself negotiated with the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meihaku

sentence.kanji: 彼が犯人なのは明白です。
sentence.romaji: kare ga hannin na no ha meihaku desu
sentence.english: It's clear that he's the perpetrator.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichuu

sentence.kanji: 日中はずっと海で泳いでいました。
sentence.romaji: nichuu ha zuto umi de oyoide imashita
sentence.english: I swam in the sea all day long.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's agaru

sentence.kanji: 冷めないうちにどうぞお上がり下さい。
sentence.romaji: samenai uchi ni douzo oagari kudasai
sentence.english: Please eat it while it is still hot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's asahi

sentence.kanji: 朝日が昇りましたよ。
sentence.romaji: asahi ga noborimashita yo
sentence.english: The morning sun rose.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noboru

sentence.kanji: 太陽は東から昇ります。
sentence.romaji: taiyou ha higashi kara noborimasu
sentence.english: The sun rises in the east.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meshita

sentence.kanji: 彼は目下の者にも優しいんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha meshita no mono ni mo yasashii n da
sentence.english: He's kind to his juniors too.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuu

sentence.kanji: うちの子の身長はクラスで中くらいです。
sentence.romaji: uchi no ko no shinchou ha kurasu de chuu kurai desu
sentence.english: My child is of average height in class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moto

sentence.kanji: 私はその教授の下で論文を書いたの。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sono kyouju no moto de ronbun wo kaita no
sentence.english: I wrote my thesis under that professor's supervision.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichuu

sentence.kanji: 日中貿易は急激に伸びているわね。
sentence.romaji: nichuu boueki ha kyuugeki ni nobite iru wa ne
sentence.english: Trade has expanded rapidly between Japan and China.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hinomaru

sentence.kanji: 日本の国旗は日の丸と呼ばれています。
sentence.romaji: nipon no koki ha hinomaru to yobarete imasu
sentence.english: Japan's national flag is known as the rising-sun flag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuu

sentence.kanji: 旧ソビエトは今はロシアと呼ばれている。
sentence.romaji: kyuusobieto ha ima ha roshia to yobarete iru
sentence.english: The former Soviet Union is now called Russia.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jou

sentence.kanji: 握り寿司の上を注文したよ。
sentence.romaji: nigirizushi no jou wo chuumon shita yo
sentence.english: I ordered the best hand-rolled sushi.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gehin

sentence.kanji: 彼女の下品なふるまいには我慢できない。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no gehin na furumai ni ha gaman dekinai
sentence.english: I can't put up with her vulgar behavior.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's burasagaru

sentence.kanji: 猿が木にぶら下がってるな。
sentence.romaji: saru ga ki ni burasagate ru na
sentence.english: The monkey is hanging in the tree.
